idea-plugin:
de.markiewb.idea.gwtnavigator Navigator extension for Google Web Toolkit 1.0 markiewb You can jump between GWT services using the "Related Symbol..." action.
It allows you to
  • Jump from com.foo.client.MyService to com.foo.client.MyServiceAsync and com.foo.server.MyServiceImpl
  • Jump from com.foo.client.MyServiceAsync to com.foo.client.MyService and com.foo.server.MyServiceImpl
  • Jump from com.foo.server.MyServiceImpl to com.foo.client.MyService and com.foo.client.MyServiceAsync
1.0: Initial version - jump to files (regardless which method is currently active) `
